name: Cool Beans
description:
Cool Beans

Cool Beans is a fast-paced 3D platformer adventure in which you play as agent John "Cool Bean" Delgado. Delgado is on a mission to retrieve Fatherbean's hat which was stolen by some very bad beanos.

The goal of the game is to beat all enemies and pass through all obstacles in the level. The task is made harder by optional targets that you can shoot at to gain points and by various quick-death scenarios (rising water level, waves of fire, being targeted by mortars). Those mechanics try to constantly keep you on the move.

The lower your final score, the better. The final score is calculated using passed time, from which your points (gained by killing enemies and shooting targets) are deducted. If you score below a certain threshold you will be awarded a gold medal. Beating one level unlocks access and story of the next level - beat all levels to win the game. Try to unlock all achievements while you're at it.

While you play the levels, the story happens as a series of conversations.

There is a tutorial level available. In the tutorial, Commander Josh will explain to you how to play the game and control the character.

Controls:

arrow keys - movement

ctrl - shoot weapon / throw grenade

space - jump

escape  - pause
